content.description: A sports physician conducted a study to investigate whether there is an association between running experience and the occurrence of a certain sport injury for marathon runners while training for a marathon. Data were collected on a random sample of <math alttext="51" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>51</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> marathon runners. Each runner from the sample was categorized by running experience (low, medium, high) and whether or not the runner experienced the sport injury while training for a marathon. The conditions for inference were met, and a <math alttext="chi square" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>Ï‡</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> test statistic of approximately <math alttext="8.12" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>8.12</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> was calculated.
content.question: Which of the following describes the <math alttext="p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-value of the test?

choices.label: <math alttext="0.10 is less than p-value, which is less than 0.25" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.10</mn><mo><</mo><mi>p</mi><mtext>-value</mtext><mo><</mo><mn>0.25</mn></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="0.05 is less than p-value, which is less than 0.10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.05</mn><mo><</mo><mi>p</mi><mtext>-value</mtext><mo><</mo><mn>0.10</mn></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="0.01 is less than p-value, which is less than 0.05" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.01</mn><mo><</mo><mi>p</mi><mtext>-value</mtext><mo><</mo><mn>0.05</mn></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="0.01 is less than p-value, which is less than 0.05" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.01</mn><mo><</mo><mi>p</mi><mtext>-value</mtext><mo><</mo><mn>0.05</mn></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 8.6: Carrying Out a Chi-Square Test for Homogeneity or Independence

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Calculate a test statistic and find a p-value, provided conditions for inference are met.
